name: Notion Mood Journal + Tracker
description: Version 2 launched! Overall better interface and UX NEW: Quick New page NEW: See Recent Edits section in all pages REWORK: No more editing rules REWORK: Mood Ranks maximum of 5 → No Limits Surprise yourself with the patterns you'll find.Journals revolve around the past.But this mood journal has time in 3D.So dump your thoughts and let your moods turn to data across time.Are you ready to journey within, explore your emotions, and achieve emotional well-being?Use the Notion Mood Journal + Tracker
features: Overall better interface and UX; NEW: Quick New page; NEW: See Recent Edits section in all pages; REWORK:No more editing rules; REWORK:Mood Ranks maximum of 5 → No Limits; Multiple Notion tips and tutorial clips within the template to aid newer users; Dynamic Emotions— Feel free to set as many emotions as you want across five ascending mood ranks; Entry Counter
